title: Cellulophaga growth reading
original description: For One-step growth curves for Cellulophaga phages protocol and Transcriptomics During One-Step Growth Curves for Cellulophaga Phages protocol.
steps:
None
1. Pipet 200 μl of MLB media into wells A1 and A2 of a white microtiter plate  
NOTES This is your ‘blank’.
2. Pipet 200 μl of sample (the new culture you just inoculated) into wells B1 and B2 of the same plate  
NOTES Ensure that there are no bubbles in the wells, as they will affect your readings. Pipet away any bubbles.
3. Read the plate on the plate reader
ai_generated_description: This protocol outlines steps to track the growth of Cellulophaga phages through a one-step growth curve method, utilizing a sample placed in a white microtiter plate. Measurement is conducted using a plate reader, ensuring an accurate read of growth for further analysis in transcriptomics experiments.

# Protocol steps

pipet_into_wells(volume="200 μl", media="new culture", well_destination=["B1", "B2"]) # Step 2: adding sample into wells B1 and B2
monitor_bubbles(well_location=["B1", "B2"]) # NOTES: ensure no bubbles are present in the wells
